title: [Resolved] 5/1 -- Login Down/Games not starting
body:
>#UPDATE 7:55PM PDT

>Through our investigation, we found the smoking gun we were looking for as to what is causing this issue.  The battle we had was finding the right and stable solution so we don't experience it again later.  We're not about to just use elmers glue and duct tape here.  

>Everything should now be resolved and stable.  There might be a long login queue at first though as we get everyone back on.  We'll let everyone know if we any future issues!

-----------------

Hey all,

Earlier today around 6:30PM PDT, we noticed that players were not being able to login, an shortly thereafter games were not properly starting out of Champion Select.  Almost immediately after, we activated Loss Forgiven.  We called up all of our resources and immediately started to investigate and triage.  We don't have a smoking gun just yet on what prompted this, but we aren't going to rest until we find it and resolve it.

We'll provide more details and updates as we get them.
